short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate randomized, human readable strings for naming test data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dice Roll is an extension to quickly generate randomized, human readable names for your testing data. Now you'll never have to go back to the days of naming things as "test", "test-1", "test-2", and so on.

FEATURES:

NAMING CATEGORIES: Assemble names using randomized values picked from different categories of your choosing: animals, adjectives, colors, famous figures, digits, the NATO alphabet, and UUIDs. There's millions of possibilities!

STRING CUSTOMIZATION: Need a random string in a particular format, such as a URL, file path, or email address? Using the delimiter, prefix, and suffix controls to create names in the exact schema you need.

RIGHT-CLICK INSERTION: When editing any text input field, you can right click to insert a randomized name directly into the input, without having to directly open this extension. The inserted name will follow your saved schema preferences.

SHORTCUTS: Use keyboard shortcuts to insert a randomized name into an editable element (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + U), or add a randomized name to your clipboard (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift +  Y). You can modify these shortcuts in your browser's extension settings.

COPY & GO: With one click, you can quickly generate new names with your rules and copy them.
